text.autoconfig.nqcol.title: Nqcol Configuration
text.autoconfig.nqcol.option.autoHit.min: Minimum delay between attacks in milliseconds
text.autoconfig.nqcol.option.autoHit.max: Maximum delay between attacks in milliseconds
text.autoconfig.nqcol.option.autoHit.jit: Random jitter added to delay in milliseconds (±value)
text.autoconfig.nqcol.option.autoPress.m: Minimum delay between key presses in milliseconds
Maximum delay between key presses in milliseconds
text.autoconfig.nqcol.option.autoPress.k: GLFW key code of the key to press (default: 79 = 'O')
text.autoconfig.nqcol.option.onlyRunInGa: Only run automation when no menus are open
text.autoconfig.nqcol.option.onlyAtNight: When enabled, AutoHit and AutoPress only run during Minecraft night when Mobs are present (approx. 6:45pm–5:45am)
